Job title: Machine Learning, Manager Location: RemoteSalary: $200-230k & Equity & Bonus Contract: PermanentAlldus are currently working with an exciting SAAS company to help hire for a Machine Learning Manager, This is a great opportunity working for a growing company to have a real impact on their internal team. The role will be fully remote and will have the chance to grow in responsibilities in the next 18 months. Job Responsibilities:- Working as part of an ML team to build a scalable platform for external customers- Design, deploy and manage prototypes working closely with the team and stakeholders in the business-Research and develop NLP algorithms- Collaborate with team and wider organization to execute business goals and complete projects with specific timeframesRequirements:- 5+ years of ML experience- Experience working with NLP, Tenserflow, Pytorch, Kubeflow- Experience working with deployment of large language models- Masters or Ph.D. in ML or a similar field- Experience leading platform teams in the past
